doc.field: Series III. Hair of notable individuals
Series III. Hair of notable individuals
Hansbrough, Joseph Sumner (1790–1864) [maternal grandfather of Mrs. Chester A. Arthur]
Hansbrough, Joseph Sumner (1790–1864) [maternal grandfather of Mrs. Chester A. Arthur]

• Envelope reads: "Hair of Hon. Col. J. T. Harisbough (sic) / Hansbough? / Hansbrough?" [INV.72] • Packet reads: "Hair. Col. J.S. Hansbrough / My father / E.H. Herndon." • "E.H. Herndon" = Elizabeth Frances (Hansbrough) Herndon (1817–1878), mother of Ellen Lewis "Nell" (Herndon) Arthur (1837–1880), wife of President Chester A. Arthur.
